Class Table

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable

Direct Known Subclasses:

    checkUno(Player currentPlayer, int delayUno)
    check if the player has said UNO, if not the player will draw 2 cards and return false check if the player has won the match, if yes it will return true else false it notifies the observers if the player has won the match, if the player has said UNO or not

    run()
    it will be executed when the Thread is started, it launches the game
    protected void
    startGame()
    The loop of the game, it will be executed in a thread and will be stopped when the game is over Initialize the game, then it will be executed the matches until the game is over after every match it controls if the game is over, if not it will be executed a new match in the beginning of every match it will be executed the reset of the table
    protected void
    startMatch()
    The loop of the match, it will be executed in a thread and will be stopped when the match is over Initialize the match, then it will be executed the turns until the match is over in the beginning of the match it will be executed the resetMatch method
    protected abstract boolean
    startTurn(Player player)
    The loop of the turn, it will be executed in a thread and will be stopped when the turn is over Initialize the turn, then it will be executed the actions until the turn is over in the beginning of the turn it will be executed the startTurn method it notifies the observers all the actions that the player has done
    void
    stopEarlier()
    stop the game earlier

    • startGame

      protected void startGame()
      The loop of the game, it will be executed in a thread and will be stopped when the game is over Initialize the game, then it will be executed the matches until the game is over after every match it controls if the game is over, if not it will be executed a new match in the beginning of every match it will be executed the reset of the table

    • startMatch

      protected void startMatch()
      The loop of the match, it will be executed in a thread and will be stopped when the match is over Initialize the match, then it will be executed the turns until the match is over in the beginning of the match it will be executed the resetMatch method

    • startTurn

      protected abstract boolean startTurn(Player player)
      The loop of the turn, it will be executed in a thread and will be stopped when the turn is over Initialize the turn, then it will be executed the actions until the turn is over in the beginning of the turn it will be executed the startTurn method it notifies the observers all the actions that the player has done
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is playing
      Returns:
      true if the player has won the match else false

    • checkUno

      protected boolean checkUno(Player currentPlayer, int delayUno)
      check if the player has said UNO, if not the player will draw 2 cards and return false check if the player has won the match, if yes it will return true else false it notifies the observers if the player has won the match, if the player has said UNO or not
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player who is playing
      delayUno - The delay to wait before the player will be forced to draw 2 cards
      Returns:
      true if the player has won the match else false

    • checkEffects

      protected void checkEffects(Card chosenCard)
      check the effects of the card played by the player, then it notifies the observers the effects
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - The card played by the player

    • checkPoints

      protected boolean checkPoints()
      check if the player has won the match, it updates all the points of the players and notify the observers
      Returns:
      true if the player has won the match else false

    • applyEffects

      protected Player applyEffects(Player currentPlayer)
      apply the effects of the cards played by the player in the previous turn
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player who should play
      Returns:
      The player who should play in case of a skip effect else the same player passed

    • resetGame

      protected void resetGame()
      it will be executed at the start of the Game, it resets all the variables and notify the observers

    • resetMatch

      protected void resetMatch()
      it will be executed at the start of the Match, it resets all the variables and notify the observers

    • resetTurn

      protected void resetTurn()
      it will be executed at the start of the Turn, it resets all the variables and notify the observers

      make the Thread sleep for a certain amount of time
      Parameters:
